properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 12 at 10:35AM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Grand Forks ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills.
Wind chills as low as 50 below zero through this afternoon.
Winds begin to subside this evening with wind chills still
expected to be as low as 40 below zero through the Advisory
period.

* WHERE...Benson and Eddy Counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 3 PM CST this
afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 PM this
afternoon to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
